code: import React from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import imgsun from'../../assets/images/icon/sun.png';import imgmoon from'../../assets/images/icon/moon.png';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var DarkMode=function DarkMode(){var clickedClass="clicked";var body=document.body;var lightTheme="is_light";var darkTheme="is_dark";var theme;if(localStorage){theme=localStorage.getItem("theme");}if(theme===lightTheme||theme===darkTheme){body.classList.add(theme);}else{body.classList.add(darkTheme);}var switchTheme=function switchTheme(e){if(theme===darkTheme){body.classList.replace(darkTheme,lightTheme);e.target.classList.remove(clickedClass);localStorage.setItem("theme","is_light");theme=lightTheme;}else{body.classList.replace(lightTheme,darkTheme);e.target.classList.add(clickedClass);localStorage.setItem("theme","is_dark");theme=darkTheme;}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mode-switcher",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{className:"sun",to:"#",onClick:function onClick(e){return switchTheme(e);},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:imgsun,alt:""})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{className:"moon",to:"#",onClick:function onClick(e){return switchTheme(e);},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:imgmoon,alt:""})})]});};export default DarkMode;
